explanation: [0-0] In a room with brown wooden flooring, a blond man wearing a blue T-shirt and dark blue jeans kneels with his back to the camera. In front of him is a black tripod holding a black smartphone. The phone's screen is lit and shows a video recording interface. In front of a white wall are a green curtain and a cardboard box. There are cardboard paddles on both sides of the cardboard box. He touches a red button on the phone screen with his right hand.
[0-2] The man stands up and walks towards the cardboard box. The phone starts recording.
[0-2] The man stands up and walks towards the cardboard box. The phone starts recording.
[2-6] The man steps into the cardboard box and sits facing forward. Holding the cardboard paddles in his hands, he moves them rhythmically, as if rowing a boat.

[6-10] After rowing for a while, he turns his head to the back right and is startled. He turns back with a scared expression, mouth open, paddling rapidly with both hands.

[10-12] Subsequently, the man's eyes widen as he looks forward. Suddenly, his whole body turns red, and gray and white circular special effects appear in the frame. Immediately afterward, the circular special effects turn into crescent shapes and gradually disappear. Finally, the two paddles fall from both sides of the wooden box, and the man falls into the cardboard box, revealing only a small section of his red knee.
